services.tooltip: assign taxonomy with BLAST against selected database

extraInputs.name: e_value
extraInputs.tooltip: a parameter that describes the number of hits one can expect to see by chance when searching a database of a particular size. The lower the e-value the more 'significant' the match is

extraInputs.name: word_size
extraInputs.tooltip: the size of the initial word that must be matched between the database and the query sequence

Inputs.name: database_file
Inputs.tooltip: database file (may be fasta formated - automatically will convert to BLAST database format)

Inputs.name: strands
Inputs.tooltip: query strand to search against database. Both = search also reverse complement
